nodes.text: Gavin Bresch was a male Human who served in the Cularin Militia as a lieutenant. He worked in the Militia's counterintelligence division under the leadership of General Xirossk. In 19 BBY, as part of his duties with them, he met the Heroes of Cularin aboard the Cularin IV and asked them to track down a Believers strike team that was planning to attack an important summit of various Cularin system leaders.
